name: queenly-majesty

effect.scarlet_violet: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.
effect.the_teal_mask: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.
effect.the_indigo_disk: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.

short_effect: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The Pokémon's majesty pressures opponents and makes them unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.
flavor_text.the_teal_mask: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.
